{"id":777190218,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1660850139,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/777190218/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int maxval=0;\n    \n    void dfs(vector<vector<int>>& grid,int i,int j ,int &val){\n        if(i <0 || j<0 || i>=grid.size() || j>=grid[0].size() ||\n          grid[i][j] == 0 || grid[i][j] == 2)\n            return;\n        grid[i][j] = 2;\n        val++;\n        maxval = max(maxval,val);\n        dfs(grid,i+1,j,val);\n        dfs(grid,i-1,j,val);\n        dfs(grid,i,j+1,val);\n        dfs(grid,i,j-1,val);\n    }\n    \n    \n    \n    \n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n      int n = grid.size();\n      int m = grid[0].size();\n        int val =0;\n      for(int i =0 ;i<n;i++){\n          for(int j = 0 ;j<m;j++){\n              if(grid[i][j] == 1){\n                  val =0;\n                  dfs(grid,i,j,val);\n              }\n          }\n      }\n        return maxval;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
